text: Marek Gołąb (7 May 1940 - 6 October 2017) was a Polish weightlifter who competed in the 1968 Summer Olympics at which he won a bronze medal in the middle-heavyweight division. He was born in Zakliczyn, Poland. Gołąb died in Warsaw, Poland on 6 October 2017 at the age of 77.Polskie ciężary w żałobie, nie żyje Marek Gołąb ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Weightlifters Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Poland
title: Marek Gołąb
